get.summary: Gets items based on a query.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user id supplied as query parameter; this is required when not using an API key.

parameters.name: maxOfficialRating
parameters.description: Optional filter by maximum official rating (PG, PG-13, TV-MA, etc).

parameters.name: hasThemeSong
parameters.description: Optional filter by items with theme songs.

parameters.name: hasThemeVideo
parameters.description: Optional filter by items with theme videos.

parameters.name: hasSubtitles
parameters.description: Optional filter by items with subtitles.

parameters.name: hasSpecialFeature
parameters.description: Optional filter by items with special features.

parameters.name: hasTrailer
parameters.description: Optional filter by items with trailers.

parameters.name: adjacentTo
parameters.description: Optional. Return items that are siblings of a supplied item.

parameters.name: indexNumber
parameters.description: Optional filter by index number.

parameters.name: parentIndexNumber
parameters.description: Optional filter by parent index number.

parameters.name: hasParentalRating
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that have or do not have a parental rating.

parameters.name: isHd
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are HD or not.

parameters.name: is4K
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are 4K or not.

parameters.name: locationTypes
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on LocationType. This allows multiple, comma delimited.

parameters.name: excludeLocationTypes
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on the LocationType. This allows multiple, comma delimited.

parameters.name: isMissing
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are missing episodes or not.

parameters.name: isUnaired
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are unaired episodes or not.

parameters.name: minCommunityRating
parameters.description: Optional filter by minimum community rating.

parameters.name: minCriticRating
parameters.description: Optional filter by minimum critic rating.

parameters.name: minPremiereDate
parameters.description: Optional. The minimum premiere date. Format = ISO.

parameters.name: minDateLastSaved
parameters.description: Optional. The minimum last saved date. Format = ISO.

parameters.name: minDateLastSavedForUser
parameters.description: Optional. The minimum last saved date for the current user. Format = ISO.

parameters.name: maxPremiereDate
parameters.description: Optional. The maximum premiere date. Format = ISO.

parameters.name: hasOverview
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that have an overview or not.

parameters.name: hasImdbId
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that have an IMDb id or not.

parameters.name: hasTmdbId
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that have a TMDb id or not.

parameters.name: hasTvdbId
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that have a TVDb id or not.

parameters.name: isMovie
parameters.description: Optional filter for live tv movies.

parameters.name: isSeries
parameters.description: Optional filter for live tv series.

parameters.name: isNews
parameters.description: Optional filter for live tv news.

parameters.name: isKids
parameters.description: Optional filter for live tv kids.

parameters.name: isSports
parameters.description: Optional filter for live tv sports.

parameters.name: excludeItemIds
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered by excluding item ids. This allows multiple, comma delimited.

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: Optional. The record index to start at. All items with a lower index will be dropped from the results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Optional. The maximum number of records to return.

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: When searching within folders, this determines whether or not the search will be recursive. true/false.

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Optional. Filter based on a search term.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sort Order - Ascending, Descending.

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description: Specify this to localize the search to a specific item or folder. Omit to use the root.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Optional. Specify additional fields of information to return in the output. This allows multiple, comma delimited. Options: Budget, Chapters, DateCreated, Genres, HomePageUrl, IndexOptions, MediaStreams, Overview, ParentId, Path, People, ProviderIds, PrimaryImageAspectRatio, Revenue, SortName, Studios, Taglines.

parameters.name: excludeItemTypes
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on item type. This allows multiple, comma delimited.

parameters.name: includeItemTypes
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on the item type. This allows multiple, comma delimited.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Optional. Specify additional filters to apply. This allows multiple, comma delimited. Options: IsFolder, IsNotFolder, IsUnplayed, IsPlayed, IsFavorite, IsResumable, Likes, Dislikes.

parameters.name: isFavorite
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are marked as favorite, or not.

parameters.name: mediaTypes
parameters.description: Optional filter by MediaType. Allows multiple, comma delimited.

parameters.name: imageTypes
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on those containing image types. This allows multiple, comma delimited.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Optional. Specify one or more sort orders, comma delimited. Options: Album, AlbumArtist, Artist, Budget, CommunityRating, CriticRating, DateCreated, DatePlayed, PlayCount, PremiereDate, ProductionYear, SortName, Random, Revenue, Runtime.

parameters.name: isPlayed
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are played, or not.

parameters.name: genres
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on genre. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

parameters.name: officialRatings
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on OfficialRating. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on tag. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

parameters.name: years
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on production year. This allows multiple, comma delimited.

parameters.name: enableUserData
parameters.description: Optional, include user data.

parameters.name: imageTypeLimit
parameters.description: Optional, the max number of images to return, per image type.

parameters.name: enableImageTypes
parameters.description: Optional. The image types to include in the output.

parameters.name: person
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified person.

parameters.name: personIds
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified person id.

parameters.name: personTypes
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, along with Person, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified person and PersonType. Allows multiple, comma-delimited.

parameters.name: studios
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on studio. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

parameters.name: artists
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on artists. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

parameters.name: excludeArtistIds
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on artist id. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

parameters.name: artistIds
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified artist id.

parameters.name: albumArtistIds
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified album artist id.

parameters.name: contributingArtistIds
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified contributing artist id.

parameters.name: albums
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on album. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

parameters.name: albumIds
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on album id. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Optional. If specific items are needed, specify a list of item id's to retrieve. This allows multiple, comma delimited.

parameters.name: videoTypes
parameters.description: Optional filter by VideoType (videofile, dvd, bluray, iso). Allows multiple, comma delimited.

parameters.name: minOfficialRating
parameters.description: Optional filter by minimum official rating (PG, PG-13, TV-MA, etc).

parameters.name: isLocked
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are locked.

parameters.name: isPlaceHolder
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are placeholders.

parameters.name: hasOfficialRating
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that have official ratings.

parameters.name: collapseBoxSetItems
parameters.description: Whether or not to hide items behind their boxsets.

parameters.name: minWidth
parameters.description: Optional. Filter by the minimum width of the item.

parameters.name: minHeight
parameters.description: Optional. Filter by the minimum height of the item.

parameters.name: maxWidth
parameters.description: Optional. Filter by the maximum width of the item.

parameters.name: maxHeight
parameters.description: Optional. Filter by the maximum height of the item.

parameters.name: is3D
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are 3D, or not.

parameters.name: seriesStatus
parameters.description: Optional filter by Series Status. Allows multiple, comma delimited.

parameters.name: nameStartsWithOrGreater
parameters.description: Optional filter by items whose name is sorted equally or greater than a given input string.

parameters.name: nameStartsWith
parameters.description: Optional filter by items whose name is sorted equally than a given input string.

parameters.name: nameLessThan
parameters.description: Optional filter by items whose name is equally or lesser than a given input string.

parameters.name: studioIds
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on studio id. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

parameters.name: genreIds
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on genre id. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

parameters.name: enableTotalRecordCount
parameters.description: Optional. Enable the total record count.

parameters.description: Optional, include image information in output.

DeviceProfile.description:
A MediaBrowser.Model.Dlna.DeviceProfile represents a set of metadata which determines which content a certain device is able to play.
Specifically, it defines the supported containers and codecs (video and/or audio, including codec profiles and levels) the device is able to direct play (without transcoding or remuxing), as well as which containers/codecs to transcode to in case it isn't.
